name: Minimalist
description: Clean design with maximum white space and subtle typography

sections.title: Professional Summary
sections.content: Creative UX designer with 4+ years of experience crafting user-centered digital experiences. Specialized in mobile app design and user research. Passionate about creating intuitive interfaces that solve real user problems.

jobs.title: Senior UX Designer
bullets: Designed user interfaces for mobile apps used by 2M+ users
Conducted user research and usability testing to inform design decisions
Collaborated with product managers and developers to implement designs
Mentored junior designers and established design system guidelines

jobs.title: UX Designer
bullets: Created wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
Performed user interviews and analyzed user behavior data
Designed responsive web interfaces for e-commerce clients
Presented design solutions to clients and stakeholders
